conversations.content: Sorry for the delay, everybody—but your trusty maid Melody is finally done with her outfit swap. Ta-daaaaaah!
And in these sweet new threads, I'm ready to get out there and grab Valentine's BY THE THROAT!
Which means it's time for me to hop in the kitchen trenches and help everybody whip up some tasty treats.
She, uh, seems rather excited considering she only changed because she spilled chocolate all over her last outfit.
Ah, but I can understand her eagerness; I rarely have the luxury to take time preparing treats, and I find myself rather excited at the prospect.
Yeah, but you're normal. In HER case, the moment she gets excited about something, it causes...issues.
I got the eggs and butter and—AAAAH!
Like I said: issues.
The more eager she is for something, the more furious her fall, it seems.
Aw, boo! I broke the eggs...
That's 'cause you were tearing through the kitchen like your pants were on fire. *sigh* Look, can you stand?
Y-yes... I'll manage...
Huh?! Eeeek!
Melody?! Philia?!
Owwww! What is your DEAL, man?! I just helped you up, and you toppled right back down again—on ME!
I'm sorry! The floor is all super slippery for some reason!
THAT'S BECAUSE IT'S COVERED WITH BROKEN EGGS!
I beg your pardon, ladies, but you might wish to spare a glance behind you.
AAAAAAH! THE STOVE IS ON FIRE!
Ack! Okay, lemme just... Oh noooo! I can't put it out! There's a bunch of oil or something on the stove!
Did you not come in here carrying a large amount of butter, Melody?
Actually, yeah. I did. I wonder where it all went? I had it, then I dropped the eggs, sooooo theeeeen...
I believe the butter is currently on fire. I would suggest rectifying this situation with all possible speed, lest we burn down the entire Halidom.
Not to worry! Cleo showed me how to deal with burning oil once!
First, I need a wet towel... Ah, there we go!
Melody, look out! Your sleeve is caught on that container of—
AAAAAAH! *cough* *hack* *wheeze* P-powdered sugar alert! It's everywhere!
Fire and dust... My, but that's a bad combination...
EVERYBODY RUN! GET OUT OF THE KITCHEN!
Waaah! I'm so sooooorry!
How many times do you plan to engulf my kitchen in flames until you have satisfaction, Melody?
I'm really sorry, Cleo. It was an accident.
*sigh* I should have fired you when I had the chance.
Well, there's nothing for it: Since you cause nothing but trouble for others, I hereby ban you from the kitchen for the duration of Valentine's.
Wait, so I'm a kitchen exile? Noooo!
*sigh* I only wanted to help...
Still, I suppose this is better than the axe. By which I mean fired, although Cleo looked mad enough to use a REAL axe...
Well, I'll just have to find another way to make myself useful.
Oh, I know! I'll clean everyone's rooms!
Knock knock! Housekeeping!
Oh, hello there, Melody. Doing some room cleaning?
Yes indeed, master! Er, but if I can pry, what are you still doing in your room? You're usually off fighting fiends or the like at this hour of the day, right?
I had some things to take care of. Oh, that reminds me!
Do you happen to know if there's a good jeweler in the area?
There are a few in one of the nearby villages. Er, do you need one?
I do. See, there's a particular noble family that I'm rather indebted to, and their daughter is coming of age soon.
I wanted to send them a nice gift for the occasion, and I've been wracking my brain to figure out something appropriate. I thought maybe jewelry would work?
Do you want me to come with you to help pick out something she might like?
That would be great, actually. Are you sure you don't mind?
Of course not! It's my job to be of service to you in every way!
In that case, it's a deal. I'll head over there in a couple of days, if that works.
I'll be there!
Thank you again, Melody. It will be really reassuring to have you with me.
Reassuring? Really? Wow, that's the first time in my maid life that anyone's ever said that about me.
And since he's being so nice, I need to find a way to show him how much I appreciate HIM! I mean, what with it being Valentine's and all.
Okay, but how? I can't just walk up and thank him—that would be SUPER dull.
If yer lookin' what to impress the boss for Valentine's, ya can't go wrong with with a heartfelt present.
A present... That's a fine idea, Ranzal!
Yeah, I'm full of 'em. Oh, and after ya give him the goods, the two of ya can hit a cafe for tea and some'a them little sandwiches what with the crusts cut off.
Oh, this just gets better! That would help him relax from all his daily... Um...
Wait, how long have you been standing there?
Bwa ha ha! Oh, not that long. Just can't help but pipe up when I hear folks monologuin' like ya was.
Still, I never thought YOU'D fall for the boss, too! So what's the plan? Gonna lay yer feelings out in the open, or is this more of a stealth deal?
What? N-no! You have this all wrong! I mean, of course I like my master, but I don't LIKE like him!
Ain't no need to be shy with ol' Ranzal! C'mon, spill the dirt. These big shoulders of mine are great for cryin' on—or we can just plan yer little date!
Melody and the boss, kissin' in a tree! K-I-S-S...uh...S-E...W...? Ah, hell. I can't spell for crap.
STOP IT, RANZAL! This is just a little thank-you—NOT a date!
I mean, sure, it's just the two of us alone on Valentine's, but that doesn't...mean...
ACK! Wait, IS this a date?!
All right! I've got about half the firewood chopped now, so I think I'll take a break.
I can't believe I'm actually going on a date with my master.
I wonder what it'll be like...?
Not good. Too many people.
＂Should we hold hands? It wouldn't do for us to become separated.＂
Ooo, the night view is lovely!
＂Not nearly so lovely as you, my sweet darling sweetie.＂
Something like that, right? Oh, my!
*gasp* No! Nononono! We're just going shopping—it is definitely NOT a date!
Get your head out of weirdville, Melody! Focus! Chop that firewood!
Hah! Hah! Nyah! Hngah! Hraaaaaah!
Ooof... I chopped too much... Everything hurts and I wanna pass out...
(What is WITH you today, you dorkus? You're just going out with your master on a shopping trip! Not a date!)
(We'll meet up, walk the town together, do some shopping...)
Hrghrghr... Blargh. Can't sleep at all.
Well, since I'm up, I might as well draw up a plan for our outing!
We're meeting at the castle gates in the morning, right? So when we get to town, we probably go right to the jewelry store.
We'll pop into a few places, and then I'll give him his present in the town square. Hmm... I need to nail that present down. Maybe a handmade sweater?
Yes! That is delightfully doable! So then after the gift, we'll pass the time talking on a little bench...
And I'll finish by giving him a treat here!
This is the perfect date plan.
EXCEPT THAT IT'S NOT A DATE, DORKUS!
What's with all the yelling in here?
Wuh?
Are you all right? Did you fall and hurt yourself again?
Yes, you're going to awaken the entire castle if you continue on at this rate.
Philia! Cibella! Wh-what a coincidence seeing you here!
What's that behind your back? A note?
WHAT NO NOTHING IS BEHIND MY BACK WHY ARE YOU EVEN ASKING THAT YOU'RE WEIRD DON'T BE WEIRD!
...Right.
Look, did you mess something up again? We won't tell Cleo, so just come clean.
Actually, I DIDN'T mess anything up...
NOW I GOTTA GO BYEEEEEE!
She actually ran away in a cloud of dust. I didn't know people could do that.
Alas, she dropped the note in her haste.
Gosh, how much of a klutz do you have to be to try SO hard to hide something and then just drop it while you run off?
The first line is crossed out, but it clearly says ＂Plan For My Date With Master.＂
WHAAAAAAT?!
*pant* I think this is far enough... They shouldn't come after...
MELODY!
Eyagh! Ph-philia?
DON'T ＂PHILIA＂ ME, HUSSY! YOU'RE TRYING TO CUT IN ON MY MAN!
Man? Wh-what man? I don't have a clue what you're—
THIS! This paper! This...DATE PLAN! You're going on a date with the prince!
Ack! My note!
HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME?! YOU SCARLET WOMAN! YOU FLOOZY!
Eeeek! Stop, Philia!
*pant* I finally...caught up to you... Philia! Calm yourself.
Melody, please explain. How long have you and the prince been engaged in a...  Well, a dating type of relationship?
It's not a DATE date, you guys! It's just...you know. A ＂date.＂ Like, a day we spend together.
I just wanted to show my master how much I appreciate him.
How much you...＂appreciate＂ him?
Okay, so here's the whole deal...
I see. So basically, you're simply going shopping in your capacity as a maid, and thought you'd take the opportunity to show your gratitude while you were at it.
Pretty much, yeah. See, I was a maid in a lot of places before this, and I ended up being fired every single time.
I mean, who WOULDN'T fire a big ol' klutz like me, am I right?
But my master is different. He said I'm bright and cheerful, and that having me around is good for morale.
I've never known the warmth of a family, but he told me I could think of everyone in the castle as my own.
I became a maid because I wanted to experience a familial bond, so that made me truly, genuinely happy.
And that's why I want to thank him. No, why I NEED to.
That is quite the tale.
Okay, I get it. Er, and sorry about that whole ＂floozy＂ thing.
It sounds like things were pretty tough for you, so I get why you want to thank him.
And while I'm still concerned about the  two of you going out...I'll support you.
Really?!
Perhaps you might let me help in this endeavor as well?
Of COURSE you can help, Cibella! This is going to be the best date ever!
Except it's NOT A DATE, DORKUS! Sheesh!
So this really IS just a day trip, right? Not a date?
I, er...think so?
*yaaaawn* It's morning already, but I managed to get it done...
One hand-knit sweater, all wrapped and ready to go!
Now to get to work on the other gift. Better wait for nightfall for that...
Oh, good! Looks like I'm alone.
Cleo banned me from the kitchen because I cause problems for others, but if others aren't here, I can't CAUSE them problems!
Although I might be skating by on a technicality here...
But whatever! I have to make these cupcakes for him, and they need to be jam-packed with all my gratitude!
Better get to it and finish this thing before anyone notices I'm here.  On my mark...get set...bake!
Hrm... It won't come together no matter how much I mix it. I guess it SHOULD taste okay, but... *lick*
Gah! Sweet! So sweet! Gosh darn it, I mixed up flour with sugar again.
Now I'll whip this cream until it's light and airy with stiff peaks... AAAAAH!
Dang it! The bowl slipped out of my fingers!
Okay, the batter looks good! Let's take a peek and see if it's cooked through...
ACK! I poked it with a skewer to check the inside and it exploded! Whyyyyy?!
*sigh* This has been a complete disaster. I'm sure no star baker...
Now I'm running low on ingredients and the sun is almost up. Maybe I should just throw in the tea towel already...
No! I need to see this through!
My master said one of my strengths is that I always see the bright side of things!
If I gave up now, I'd be giving up the strength he discovered in me!
Looks like I have just enough ingredients for one more shot at this...
I have to get it right this time. I can't fail!
*sigh* You're forgetting that you very specifically fail when you're overly eager.
Philia! Cibella! Why are you here?
We dropped by your room to give you a pep talk for tomorrow and found you gone. This was the first place we thought to look.
Honestly, if you're already messing up this much, you should have talked to me. I told you I'd help, remember?
Oh, wow, you guys...
Look, if you just stand there with a mouth hanging open, it's gonna be morning before you know it. Where's your recipe? Let's team up and get the cupcakes baked!
R-right!
And a single dollop of cream and... There! Perfection incarnate.
Same here!
Er, mine's not much to look at, but at least it's done!
I'll just put them in this box, tie it up with a ribbon, and we're good to go!
I can't thank you two enough.
Happy to help! Also, I took the liberty of cunningly loading my treat full of my OWN love for the prince. Heh heh heh...
The prince has done much for me as well, so I tried to instill that sense of gratitude into my own confection.
All that's left is for you to hand it over!
Zzzzzz...
She fell asleep standing up. That's impressive.
Little wonder, considering she made a plan, knit a sweater, and stayed up all night baking for the past two days.
*sigh* Should we carry her to her room?
We'll need to keep watch and wake her in the morning, lest she oversleep and make a big kerfuffle.
Sounds good. Tomorrow, the day of destiny arrives!
Um, how do I look? My going-out hat isn't crooked or anything, right?
You cut a dashing figure. Not a lock of hair out of place or a stray bit of fuzz to be found anywhere.
Okay, good. Well...off I go, I guess.
Take care. And do have fun!
If you bork things up with the prince, I'll never let you hear the end of it!
Got it! I'm gonna make this date—NO! It's NOT a date, DORKUS!
I'm gonna make this OUTING a smashing success!
Go get 'em, Melody.
AAAAAAH!
Oh dear.
I think she just fell down the stairs.
*sigh* She is predictable if nothing else.
Looks like Melody is running late. I wonder what happened?
Masteeer! I'm so sorry!
Melody, what happened to you?! You're covered in scrapes and bruises!
Oh, I just fell down some stairs. No big. The terrible thing is that YOU had to wait!
Uh, are you sure you're all right? We can postpone the trip if—
I'M FINE! Er, I mean, I'm fine. Now let's get this rolling, master!
Thank you! Please come again!
A broach like the one you chose will go nicely with any outfit!
I appreciate your help, Melody. I never would have selected this on my own.
Oh, I didn't do all that much...
Well, the day is still fairly young. Any idea what we could do now?
Oh! W-well, if you don't mind too terribly, maybe we could go have some tea?
Tea? Sure, why not. I guess it's been a while since I relaxed in a cafe.
(Yes! That sounded totally natural!)
(Now, I put my super awesome date— I mean, DAY—plan into play!)
(If I was ever excited about this, it feels like forever ago. I really underestimated my own ability to screw things up...)
(The nice little cafe I was thinking of has shut down, so that was a bust....)
(That lovely art exhibit closed early, so we ended up going to a horror exhibit all about fiends...)
(And then when we try to go for a nice stroll, I somehow get us lost IN THE TOWN SQUARE! How is that even POSSIBLE?)
Whew! We're out at last.
I'm so sorry, master! I didn't mean for you to navigate us out of that mess!
Oh, it's no big deal. It's actually kind of funny we managed to get lost in the middle of a small town.
Still, I bet you're tired from all that walking around. Let's get off our feet for a bit on that bench over there.
Definitely!
(Gosh darn it. Instead of giving him a nice relaxing day, I ended up making him tired...)
(But if I get all depressed, I won't be able to thank him properly.)
(Plus, the next item on my plan of attack is the one I REALLY care about! Okay, Melody. You can do this!)
A-actually, master, I have a present for you.
A present?
Yes! Er, what with it being Valentine's and all...
I wanted to give you something to show how much I appreciate all that you do, so I made you this sweater.
That's amazing, Melody. Do you mind if I open it here?
Of course! I really think you're going to love the picture I stitched on the front.
Thank you! Okay, let's see... Huh? This is...
Is this a fiend?
Actually, it's supposed to be you standing in front of the Halidom?
(Oh no! It doesn't look a thing like I wanted it to!)
(I'm pretty sure I saw more inviting work at the horror exhibit earlier!)
(This is what you get for staying up all night sewing, you dorkus!)
So it's me and the Halidom. I see. Boy, the castle sure is...red.
Well, it's...uh...an impressionistic design!  Yes, that's it. See, I wanted to represent your red-hot passion for the new kingdom that you're trying to create!
Well, it certainly has Melody written all over it. Or sewn, I suppose. Regardless, it's great. Thank you.
No, please! You don't have to force yourself to wear it or anything!
(Ugh, things are going downhill fast. And this was supposed to be the EASY part of my plan!)
(At this rate, he'll never understand how much I appreciate him!)
(Well, desperate times call for Melody measures. It's time for my patented ＂nap on lap＂ gambit!)
(It has an extraordinarily relaxing effect that I KNOW he's gonna love!)
Whew, what a day, huh? It's nice to have a chance to catch my breath once in a while like this.
I-it sure is! It kind of makes you sleepy, right?
Well, I can't say I'm sleepy myself, but I suppose I can understand someone feeling that way. The sunlight today is incredibly inviting.
It IS, isn't it?! And in that case, let's stay here and warm ourselves for a bit! Yes! Right here! Nice and toasty!
Uh, okay? You seem weirdly excited about this, but I'm happy to stay if that's what you want.
(He's suspicious, but this is good! Once he gets tired from lounging in the sunlight, I'll offer my lap for a nap and then BOOM! Perfection.)
(Now, master! Get tired! You're getting veeeery sleepy...)
(Get sleepy! Get sleepy... Get...sleeeeepy... Zzzzzz...)
Zzzzzz—WHOOZA WOZZLE?!
Enjoy your nap?
Ack! I'm so sorry!
Heh. Now I understand why you asked if I was tired—it's because you were!
(Wait, is he laughing at me?! Oh, Melody, you big dummy! How could you fall asleep in the middle of the plan?!)
(This day has been one humiliating loss after another, and all I have left are the homemade treats.)
(At least I know this one can't go wrong since Philia and Cibella helped out.)
(They're baked with love from the three of us, so they HAVE to be good!)
(There's no better way to say thank you than with something baked, after all.)
...Master? ...Master?!
(Oh, great! Now I've LOST him!)
Oh no! The box of cupcakes!
Birb?
No! It's grabbing the box! Don't even think about it, bird!
Cuh-caw!
Noooo! Stop! Don't leave with thaaaat!
*pant* The bird went this way I think...
I've gotta get those cupcakes back!
That's the only thing I have left for my master that I didn't totally screw up!
*pant* *pant* Finally...got it back...
I can't believe how much that dumb bird pecked me—I've got holes everywhere.
Still, I'd better check and make sure he didn't peck any of the cupcakes!
Well, crud. These are a total disaster. The frosting's smeared all over the box, and most of the cakes are smushed.
(Every single part of my plan is now officially a disaster.)
(I should just give up now while I'm still very, very behind.)
(I guess my master will never know how grateful I am for him...)
(No. You can't give up now, Melody. There has to be some other way!)
So if sweaters and cupcakes and lap naps won't work, I'll just have to use WORDS!
Melody!
Master?! What are you doing all the way out here?
Looking for you! Some townsfolk told me you came out this way. What in the heck HAPPENED to you?
Just another patented Melody klutz moment. But please, master, there's something that I have to tell you.
Oh? What is it?
Well, it's a simple little thing, but I REALLY mean it...
Thank you SO much for everything that you've done for me!
For giving me a place to work as a maid, and for reminding me that I have my strengths, even though I often forget.
And for giving me the warmth of family that I've long been searching for.
All of those things are so important to me, and you made them possible.
So I just want you to know that I'm the most grateful person in the WORLD.
Thank you, Melody...
Oh no, I'm sorry. Did I get carried away? I didn't mean to upset you!
But the moment just seemed right, so I had to tell you.
Aaaanyway, I guess we should head back before people start to worry.
Wait. I have something to say to you.
Uh oh. Am I fired? I'm fired, aren't it?
No, you're not fired. I just want you to know that I'm very grateful for you.
And I want to thank you for always doing your absolute best in the castle to make sure everyone is happy and satisfied.
Sure, you mess up from time to time— and tend to break more than the average amount of things—but it's only because you give your all every single day.
The size of your failures is due to the size of your feelings. I know that.
Master...
I... *sniff*
M-Melody? What's wrong? Did that come out badly?
No, I'm just happy! *sniff*
This'll stop in a second, I promise. Where'd I put that handkerchief...?
Uh oh. You dropped that box. Let me just... Er, what's IN here, anyway? And why does it look like something attacked it?
Oh! The cupcakes!
There's a card on it... ＂For my master.＂ Wait, are these for me?
Um...yes?
But I dropped the box and got attacked by a bird, so they're a total mess.
Please just pretend you never saw it!
Or you could just give them to me like you originally intended.
N-no! They're a total disaster!
Nothing is a disaster if you put your own hard work and care into them.
Um...
Well, you're not wrong—these are so banged up, it looks like Ranzal might have made them. Still...
*chomp*
Master, no! Please don't force yourself to eat those!
Oh, I'm not. They look a mess, but they taste fantastic.
It's just like with your usual clumsiness. No matter how much you might mess up, the people you're toiling away for always know how much you care about them.
I...don't know what to say.
You're always so warm and kind to me, and I like you very much.
You LIKE me?!
(He LIKES me?! He said that, right?! I'm not hearing this?!)
(Okay, calm down, Melody! He didn't mean he LIKE likes you, just that he ＂likes＂ you. Don't go making this weird.)
(...But my heart is just POUNDING!)
Er, Melody? You okay?
No! I mean yes! I mean, I AM TOTALLY CALM!
Riiight. Maybe we should head back now. You're awfully flushed, and I don't want you coming down with something.
YES, LET'S GO BACK RIGHT NOW! If we stay together just the two of us like this, I'm pretty sure my heart is going to explode!
Uh oh! You're not actually having heart problems, are you?!
Eyagh! D-don't look at meeeeee!
Are you SURE you're all right?
W-we're back...
Welcome home!
Whoa, space bubble! C'mon!
We were rather worried about you, and more than a little curious. So how did it go?
Was it a success? A failure? Does he know the depths of your gratitude now?!
Well...yes, I suppose he does.
Oh, sweet relief!
Well done, Melody!
Still, I think the only reason I pulled it off was because I wanted him to understand how the two of you feel.
I really am grateful for you both— as grateful as I am to my master.
Sweet! Oh, and because I helped you so much, I can totally count on you to help mediate my relationship with the prince next time, right? Riiiight?
I'm eager and excited to help you in any way I can!
Uh oh. She's definitely going to make a mess of things.
Well, until that happens, let us celebrate the success of Melody's day trip.
Yesss! Girls' night! I gotta go get ready!
As do I. Melody, perhaps you'd like to change and wait for us anon?
Whew! I can't believe everything that happened today...
(But now I understand just how important it is to share your feelings with the people who ought to know them.)
(Although maybe I'll leave out that one particular feeling when I tell Philia! Ha!)
(It's a special feeling that you don't feel with family members...)
That intense pounding in my heart...
